import React, { useRef } from "react"; import styles from './UseForm.module.css'; const UserForm = (props) => { const enteredName = useRef(''); const enteredNumber = useRef('') const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const name = enteredName.current.value; const number = enteredNumber const cardData = {name: name}; props.onCardInfo(cardData) } return








} export default UserForm;
